query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as total, 
       SUM(CASE WHEN deletedAt IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as not_deleted,
       SUM(CASE WHEN hidden = 0 OR hidden IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as not_hidden
FROM assessments;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2g8chP3aro94bni.root --database XnmtZZwX6e46H8JVZbq4Ta --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as total, 
       SUM(CASE WHEN deletedAt IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as not_deleted,
       SUM(CASE WHEN hidden = 0 OR hidden IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as not_hidden
FROM assessments;
